## DeepPartial type

An extension of the built-in Partial<T> type which allows partial values in deeply nested properties too.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type DeepPartial<T> = {
    [P in keyof T]?: T[P] extends never ? DeepPartial<T[P]> : DeepPartial<T[P]>;
};
```
